lines.text: ...Hold the phone. I see what's going on, here.
You almost had me, Leo! You were real close!
What the dickens are you talkin' about?
Real close! But this was just a little bit less subtle than it should've been!
Can you just get to the point?
All this magic stuff around... dressing the corpse up in robes, sticking spellbooks everywhere...
But a statue? Come on! That's going a little overboard framing a guy for wizardry!
What'd you do, pop a cap in the wrong guy, and set it up to make it look like he was a criminal anyway?
...you really don't have a lot of faith in us, huh?
...I'm not gonna say the law would never do that, especially in this town.
But not here. Not this district, and not our chief.
If you're about to start badmouthin' my wife, you're gonna learn a thing or two about police corruption you'll wish you hadn't.
